output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. CMF Number: Present (CMF 11240015) - This indicates it's electoral propaganda 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, mentions Elena Lasconi directly, who is a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook/Instagram post with 90,000-99,999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, it presents Elena Lasconi in a positive light, highlighting her work for women's rights 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly promotional content 6. Personal opinion: No, this is an official party communication
The post promotes Elena Lasconi's past activities regarding women's rights and connects them to current political activities. It's clearly electoral propaganda as it: - Has a CMF number - Mentions a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement - Aims to influence public opinion during the electoral period - Presents achievements and positive aspects of the candidate

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains CMF number - Directly promotes a presidential candidate - Is a paid advertisement with significant reach - Presents achievements and positive aspects - Uses emotional appeal to connect with voters - Is published by an official party channel (USR Dâmbovița)
conclusion.message-for-police: USR Dâmbovița, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea candidatului ELENA-VALERICA LASCONI într-o postare plătită pe Facebook (ID: 1194999424934329) după încheierea perioadei de campanie electorală. Postarea prezintă realizările candidatului și folosește mesaje emoționale pentru a influența alegătorii, având un CMF alocat (11240015) și fiind difuzată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Impactul postării este semnificativ, atingând între 90.000 și 99.999 de persoane, cu o investiție între 2.000 și 2.499 RON.
